thread.title: A Super Bowl That’s Hard to Cuddle

author: Jason Gay
title: A Super Bowl That’s Hard to Cuddle
text:
A long, long time ago, the New England Patriots were adorable. Adorable!
It’s true. You have to believe me on this. The Patriots were once so hapless, you couldn’t help but love them.
You know when the dog sticks his head in a grocery bag and can’t shake it off, and ends up walking into the refrigerator door?
...
